DOC.brief_title: Different Types Fruits Metabolic Function Cognitive Performance
DOC.detailed_description: The trial design randomized 2-arm , placebo-controlled , within-subjects crossover utilizing multiple sampling , repeat measure paradigm investigate effect consumption different type fruit cognitive performance metabolic response . This trial test 2 treatment condition forty men woman enrol study . Each subject ask come one screen visit , pre-study visit , two dinner pick-ups day two test visit 2 test visit . Participation study last approximately four week . The initial screening visit provide subject inform consent document determine eligibility anthropometric measurement , vital sign , fast blood glucose test , vein assessment , color test completion survey relate general eating , health , exercise habit . In addition , subject take brief test attention memory ensure capability willingness perform test subsequent research visit . Eligible subject train instructed record food beverage consume 3-day period ( one weekend day two weekday ) food record diary . At pre-study visit , subject instruct follow strictly limit polyphenolic diet 7 day prior study throughout participation time , maintain usual diet pattern physical activity . A dinner meal provide day study visit . At test visit , subject arrive clinic fast 8 12 hour well-hydrated state . After confirm compliance protocol , anthropometric measurement vital sign take along finger prick fast blood glucose catheter placement . Fasting baseline blood sample catheter collect baseline cognitive performance measure assess . After complete baseline measure , subject receive standard breakfast meal along beverage contain different fruit accord randomization sequence . Additional blood sample take 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 , 240 , 300 , 360 , 480 minute start breakfast meal . Additional cognitive test perform 120 , 240 , 360 , 480 minute time point . A standardized lunch provide 360 480 minute time point . Subject come clinic 2 test day visit ; procedure except treatment ( test control treatment ) .
DOC.criteria: • Subject male female age 40 65 year age Subject BMI 18.5 34.9 kg/m2 , ( inclusive ) screen visit Fasting blood sugar le 126 mg/dL Average Blood pressure le 160/100 mmHg Subject willing maintain stable body weight follow his/her regular diet physical activity pattern throughout study period . Subject willing refrain vigorous physical activity consumption alcoholic and/or caffeinated beverage 24 h prior test day Subject smoke abstain smoke least 2 year No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal hepatic disease Not take medication dietary supplement would interfere outcomes study . • Subject currently smoke smoke within past 2 year Subject work overnight i.e . night shift Subjects significant sleep disorder , traumatic brain injury , learn disability attention deficit disorder psychiatric neurological disturbance Subject color blind , impaired cognitive performance flanker test ( score < 60 screening ) vein access score < 7 Men woman know suspected food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity study material closely related compound Men woman know have/diagnosed diabetes mellitus Men woman fast blood glucose concentration ≥126 mg/dL Average blood pressure > 160/100 mmHg screen visit Men woman document vascular disease , e.g. , heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke , angina , related surgery Men woman cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer previous 2 year Men woman take medication dietary supplement may interfere study procedure endpoint study ( e.g . antioxidant , antiinflammatory medication , antidepressant medication , oral injectable hypoglycemic medication , GI medication , antibiotic , diuretic , adrenergic blocker etc . ) Subjects may choose go dietary supplement ( require 30 day washout ) Men woman take antibiotic within 5 day study start Men woman donate blood/plasma within 3 month screen visit blood donors/participants participation study result donate 1500 milliliter blood previous 12 month Substance ( alcohol drug ) abuse within last 2 year Excessive coffee tea consumption ( > 4 cups/day ) Unstable body weight fluctuation > 4.5kg ( 9.9lbs ) past 4 week Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study woman lactate . Men woman investigator uncertain subject 's capability willingness comply protocol requirement Women take unstable dose brand hormonal contraceptive and/or stable dose brand less 6 month . Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete
